para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:14px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:14px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.46; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: The WDK consists of a number of Dolphn packages which should be available in your
. You'll find the following related packages in the

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:39px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:Symbol; font-size:10pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:39px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: This package is a prerequisite of the WDK package and is used for code-signing and signature verification.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:39px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: - This is the deployment kit itself. It contains classes for deploying applets as binary packages and also a number of browser interface classes that are present in the standard Dolphin

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:39px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: - This can be used to create new, customized, versions of the plug-in DLL. Unless you particularly want to do this you do not need to install this package into your image. If you do wish to create a new version of the plug-in, then you'll also need the Lagoon Deployment Kit loaded in order to install this package.
